item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 14, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Albert Einstein's theory of relativity in words of four letters or less (78 points | 27 comments)
2. Show HN: Resurrecting Infocom's Unix Z-Machine with Cosmopolitan (74 points | 11 comments)
3. Everything wrong with MCP (189 points | 92 comments)
4. Open guide to equity compensation (419 points | 170 comments)
5. Show HN: Nissan's Leaf app doesn't have a home screen widget so I made my own (90 points | 43 comments)
6. Mario Vargas Llosa has died (54 points | 8 comments)
7. Show HN: I made a free tool that analyzes SEC filings and posts detailed reports (151 points | 43 comments)
8. Wiz's $32B GTM Playbook (47 points | 13 comments)
9. PHP Core Security Audit Results (100 points | 34 comments)
10. Why Everything in the Universe Turns More Complex (69 points | 33 comments)
11. Tariffs, Saving, and Investment (16 points | 8 comments)
12. NoProp: Training neural networks without back-propagation or forward-propagation (87 points | 16 comments)
13. New Vulnerability in GitHub Copilot, Cursor: Hackers Can Weaponize Code Agents (64 points | 25 comments)
14. Writing Cursor rules with a Cursor rule (88 points | 25 comments)
15. Comparing economic inequality between the Roman Empire and the Han Dynasty (14 points | 6 comments)
16. Neutrinos' maximum possible mass shrinks further (36 points | 11 comments)

18. Googler... ex-Googler (426 points | 243 comments)

23. Quick Primer on MCP Using Ollama and LangChain (90 points | 14 comments)
24. Calypso: LLMs as Dungeon Masters' Assistants [pdf] (48 points | 19 comments)
25. Why Fennel? (222 points | 102 comments)
26. Docker Model Runner (57 points | 15 comments)
27. The dark side of the Moomins (284 points | 86 comments)
28. Shadertoys Ported to Rust GPU (47 points | 2 comments)
29. Super Rat: the record-setting rodent sniffing out landmines and saving lives (22 points | 9 comments)
30. Emily Dickinson's Playful Letterlocking (11 points | 1 comment)
